duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine and specialized painting and related tasks to maintain the condition and appearance of medical center facilities.
Utilize mud work, taping and bedding, staining of raw wood, and finish work skills for painting tasks.
Operate hand and power tools for painting and maintenance activities.
Follow safety protocols when working in precarious or high locations such as ladders and scaffolding.
Occasionally work with neonates, infants, adolescents, adults, and geriatric patients, ensuring minimal disruption to their environment.
